photoeffects: My Colors (My Colors Off, Vivid, Neutral, Sepia, Black & White,  Custom Color (limited))
weight: Approx. 187 g (including battery/batteries and memory card)
batteries: 2x Size-AA Alkaline or NiMH Batteries (Alkalines supplied)
continuousshooting: ¹ Under conditions where the flash does not fire. ² Depending on memory card speed / capacity / compression setting.
batterylife: ¹ Using the batteries and memory card format supplied with the camera (where included), except where indicated.
aflock: Locked when shutter button is pressed half way
closestfocusingdistance: 1cm (W) from front of lens in Super Macro
construction: 7 elements in 6 groups (1 aspherical UA element)
aelock: Locked when shutter button is pressed half way
modes: Auto, P, Special Scene (Portrait, Night Snapshot, Kids & Pets, Indoor, Sunset, Foliage, Snow,  Beach, Fireworks,  Aquarium, Long Shutter, Super Macro), Movie
meteringmodes: Evaluative (linked to Face Detection AF frame), Centre-weighted average, Spot (centre)
zoom: ¹ Depending on the image size selected. ² Digital zoom available for still image and standard movie modes only. Optical zoom may not be available during movie recording.
powersupplybatterychargers: Battery Charger Kit CBK4-300, Ni-MH Batteries NB4-300, AC adapter kit ACK800
movielength: ¹ Depending on memory card speed / capacity / compression setting.
menulanguages: English, German, French, Dutch, Danish, Finnish, Italian, Norwegian, Swedish, Spanish, Simplified Chinese, Chinese (traditional), Japanese, Russian, Portuguese, Korean, Greek, Polish, Czech, Hungarian, Turkish, Thai, Arabic, Ukrainian, Romanian, Farsi
